definition: to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure
to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
to stay up late or all night
see 媳婦熬成婆|媳妇熬成婆[xi2 fu4 ao4 cheng2 po2]
pinyin: duo1 nian2 xi2 fu4 ao2 cheng2 po2

definition: lit. even a submissive daughter-in-law will one day become a domineering mother-in-law (idiom)/fig. the oppressed will become the oppressor/what goes around comes around
to break clear of all the troubles and hardships/to achieve success/to make it
to stay up through the night (idiom)
(coll.) the reward of one's efforts/the light at the end of the tunnel

sentences.english: Example: We had to pull an all-nighter to get the work finished on time.
sentences.chinese: 为了按时完成工作，我们要熬通宵了。

sentences.english: They are boiling down the bones.
You'll get a real sense of the physical acts of painting when you look at this picture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在看画时能真切感受到熬作画时的张力。

sentences.english: Yeah, I've got a pretty good case of the blahs. I don't feel like doing much of anything.
sentences.chinese: 我给你熬了点儿鸡汤，或许你喝了会感觉好一些。

sentences.english: The quality of cooking oil in the process of repeated boiling of huoguo(hot pot)seasoning mate- rial was monitored.
sentences.chinese: 研究了火锅底料熬煮过程中油脂质量的变化。

sentences.english: The porridge of man needs to cook slowly.
Cigarettes get me through the day.
sentences.chinese: 有了香烟，我这一天才熬得过去。

sentences.english: Don't be all night over finishing your report.
sentences.chinese: 不必熬通宵来完成你的报告。

sentences.english: When Idiscovered thellos book Irealized for the first time that success can be planned.
sentences.chinese: 当我发明这本书时，我熬头次意想到乐成可以被规划。

sentences.english: The sauce should reduce to one cup.
sentences.chinese: 那沙司应被熬成一小杯。

sentences.english: You calcium, calcium needs to eat calcium bone soup boil point.
sentences.chinese: 你缺钙，需求补钙，吃钙片再熬点骨头汤喝。

sentences.english: Boils the pot nutrition soup, makes up the calcium the blood tonic.
sentences.chinese: 熬锅营养汤，补钙又补血。

sentences.english: I need a pot of porridge.
Thank goodness, I finally went through the strait with his aids.
sentences.chinese: 谢天谢地，最后，在他的帮助下，我熬了过来。

sentences.english: This is where I boil the sap down to make maple syrup.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我熬制糖树汁酿制枫蜜的地方。

sentences.english: Are you familiar with the process of sugaring off?
sentences.chinese: 熬糖制作枫糖的过程吗？

definition: to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
